row.process:
:SET &PROGRAM# = "&PROG_LC#" :SET &INIFILE# = "&PROGRAM#.ini" :SET &OPTIONS# = "&INIFILE#" :SET &MANDANT# = '&MANDANTEN#' :SET &SEL_BESCHREIBUNG# = 'Garantiefonds_Selekt' :SET &PROGRAMMTYP# = '800' :SET &PROGRAMMTYPAUSL# = '66' :SET &LOGFILE# = '&LOGDIR#/&SEL_BESCHREIBUNG#.log' :SET &OUTFILE# = '&WORKDIR#/&PROGRAM#_&TS#.out' ! --------------------------------------------- :IF &VTR_NR_LISTE# <> "" : SET &ORBLISTE# = '&WORKDIR#/&VTR_NR_LISTE#' echo "verschiebe VTR_NR_LISTE von INPUT nach WORK" mv -v "&INDIR#/&VTR_NR_LISTE#" "&ORBLISTE#" :ELSE : SET &ORBLISTE# = '' :ENDIF ! --------------------------------------------- ! INI-FILE erstellen cat << __EOF__ |tee &RUNDIR#/&INIFILE# VALUTA = &VALUTA# ABVTRNR = &AB_VTR_NR# BISVTRNR = &BIS_VTR_NR# ORBLISTE = &ORBLISTE# TRACE = &TRACE# PROT_VTR_FILTER = &PROT_VTR_FILTER_SEL# PROT_MSG_TYPE = &PROT_MSG_TYPE_SEL# MANDANT = &MANDANT# BESCHREIBUNG = &SEL_BESCHREIBUNG# PROGRAMMTYP = &PROGRAMMTYP# PROGRAMMTYPAUSL = &PROGRAMMTYPAUSL# VON = &VALUTA# BIS = &VALUTA# LOGFILE = &LOGFILE# OUTFILE = &OUTFILE# __EOF__
:IF &UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST# = "J" echo "Test 1" > &WORKDIR#/&PROGRAM#_&TS#_1.out :ENDIF
:INC JOBI.STANDARDJOB
